mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_com ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TYPE_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REPORT_COUNT, BOARD_READ_COUNT, BOARD_GOOD, BOARD_NOT_GOOD, BOARD_REG_DATE )VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{boardNum}, #{boardTypeId}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardReportCount}, #{boardReadCount}, #{boardgood}, #{boardNotgood}, #{boardRegDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BOARD_NUM), 0)+1 AS NUM FROM BOARD_COM WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP"
SELECT * FROM BOARD_COM WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP" ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_COM WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP"
SELECT * FROM BOARD_COM WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP" ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{amount}
SELECT * FROM BOARD_COM WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP" And BOARD_ID= #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_COM SET BOARD_READ_COUNT = BOARD_READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_TYPE_ID = "ADOP" And BOARD_ID= #{boardId}
